amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to issue rules or regulations to establish a fee for surplus water from Missouri River reservoirs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to issue rules or regulations to establish a fee for surplus water from Missouri River reservoirs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Noem amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Noem amendment (A063) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A063) offered by Mrs. Noem.
